member.name: T:IronOcr.AutoOcr
member.summary: A user-friendly OCR engine which extracts text and barcodes from images. AutoOcr "looks" at each image before scanning it, and uses meta-data and computer-vision to predict intelligent default settings for each setting. See also IronOcr.AdvancedOcr for faster, more specific OCR results.

member.name: F:IronOcr.AutoOcr.Language
member.summary: Natural Language of the scanned documents. Default is English.

member.name: F:IronOcr.AutoOcr.ReadBarCodes
member.summary: Enables Barcodes to be extracted from OCR documents, alongside the text content.

members.member:
Performs OCR on a multi-pages image such as a multi-frame Tiff. Also works on GIF files.
File path to a Tiff file with multiple pages/frames>
Returns paginated OCR results for all pages of the Tiff, containing Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc. Each frame is treated as a single page.

Performs OCR on a multi-pages image such as a multi-frame Tiff. Also works on GIF files.
Systemn.Drawing.Bitmap of a Tiff file with multiple pages/frames>
Returns paginated OCR results for all pages of the Tiff, containing Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc. Each frame is treated as a single page.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AutoOcr.Read(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Performs OCR on multiple Images using multi-threaded parallel processing
member.param: Documents to be scanned as an image file path.
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AutoOcr.Read(System.String)
member.summary: Performs OCR on an Image.
member.param: Document file path to be read using OCR
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

members.member:
Performs OCR on an PDF Document.
The stream data for a PDF Document to be converted back to text.
Optional enumerable list of pages. Only these page numbers will have OCR performed. Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

Performs OCR on an PDF Document.
The binary data for a PDF Document to be converted back to text.
Optional enumerable list of pages. Only these page numbers will have OCR performed. Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

Performs OCR on one page of a PDF Document.
PDF Document to be converted back to text.
Page number to OCR. The first page is 1 rather than 0. Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

Performs OCR on one page an PDF Document.
The binary data for a PDF Document to be converted back to text.
Page number to OCR. The first page is 1 rather than 0. Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

Performs OCR on one page an PDF Document.
The stream data for a PDF Document to be converted back to text.
Page number to OCR. The first page is 1 rather than 0. Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

Performs OCR on an PDF Document.
PDF Document to be converted back to text.
Optional enumerable list of pages. Only these page numbers will have OCR performed. Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AutoOcr.Read(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Performs OCR on an Image.
member.param: Document to be scanned as a System.Drawing.Image
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AutoOcr.Read(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Drawing.Image})
member.summary: Performs OCR on multiple Images simultaneously using parallel multi threading;
member.param: Document to be scanned as a System.Drawing.Image
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AutoOcr.Read(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Performs OCR on an Image.
member.param: Document to be scanned as a System.Drawing.Bitmap
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AutoOcr.Read(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Drawing.Bitmap})
member.summary: Performs OCR on multiple Images in parallel using multi-threading;
member.param: Documents to be scanned as an IEnumerable of System.Drawing.Bitmap
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AutoOcr.Read(System.String,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
Performs OCR on an Image.
Only Text and Barcodes within the CropArea will be scanned
member.param: Document to be scanned as an image file path.
A rectangular area of the image to be scanned for OCR.
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AutoOcr.Read(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
Performs OCR on an Image.
Only Text and Barcodes within the CropArea will be scanned
member.param: Document to be scanned as a System.Drawing.Image
A rectangular area of the image to be scanned for OCR.
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AutoOcr.Read(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
Performs OCR on an Image.
Only Text and Barcodes within the CropArea will be scanned
member.param: Document to be scanned as a System.Drawing.Bitmap
A rectangular area of the image to be scanned for OCR.
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: T:IronOcr.IronOcrInstallation
member.summary: Sets global installation parameters for IronOCR.

member.name: P:IronOcr.IronOcrInstallation.InstallationPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the installation path directory to which assemblies will and temporary files will be deployed. InstallationPath should be set before any or methods are called.
member.value: The installation path on a local hard disk. Leaving this value null will select a suitable temporary folder.

member.name: T:IronOcr.Languages.IOcrLanguagePack
member.summary:
Abstract class defining IronOcr language packs.
is installed by default. Additional Language packs may be added to your project via Nuget or by downloading DLLs from http://ironsoftware.com/csharp/ocr/

members.member: Composite language pack allowing IronOCR to read documents in more than once language at the same time.

member.name: M:IronOcr.Languages.MultiLanguage.#ctor(IronOcr.Languages.IOcrLanguagePack[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the language pack class.
member.param: Any number of Languages as instances of

member.name: M:IronOcr.Languages.MultiLanguage.OcrLanguagePack(IronOcr.Languages.IOcrLanguagePack[])
member.summary: Returns a composite language pack allowing IronOcr to read documents in more than once language at the same time.
member.param: Any number of Languages as instances of

member.name: T:IronOcr.Languages.English
member.summary:
English Language Pack. Installed by default with IronOcr.
Get more language packs on Nuget or by downloading DLLs from http://ironsoftware.com/csharp/ocr/

members.member: English (eng) Language pack covering American, British, Canadian, Australian, Indian and International English. This Language pack is also effective for OCR in many other languages which use of the Roman alphabet, and also for reading codes, serial numbers and vehicle number plates.

member.name: T:IronOcr.License
member.summary:
Allows IronOcr license keys to be applied globally across an application.
Apply your license using in your code, or add the key IronOcr.LicenseKey to Web.Conbfig or App.Config

member.name: F:IronOcr.License.LicenseKey
member.summary: License IronOcr for deployment. Get Licensed at http://ironsoftware.com/csharp/ocr/licensing/ A License key can also be added to Web.Config or App.Config as IronOcr.LicenseKey

member.name: M:IronOcr.License.IsValidLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether a license key is valid.
member.param: IronOcr license key as a string

member.name: T:IronOcr.OcrResult
member.summary:
Detailed results from reading one or more images using IronOcr.
contains text, barcodes, images and a detailed object model for every discovered object on each page, with detailed meta-data.

member.name: T:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage
member.summary: An object representing a whole page of content read by IronOcr. May contains text & barcodes alongside detailed enumerable meta-data

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.Width
member.summary: Width of the input document image in pixels (measured after it has been unrotated and deskewed by )

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.Height
member.summary: Height of the input document image in pixels (measured after it has been unrotated and deskewed by )

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.PageNumber
member.summary: The number of this page within an . Being 1 based, the first page is numbered 1, rather than zero.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.Text
member.summary: Full text discovered within this page as a UFT-8 string. Each paragraph of text will be separated by 2 x Environment.NewLine

member.name: M:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.ToString
member.summary: Return the pages's full

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.FontName
member.summary: The name of the most common typeface discovered within this page. If a typeface is unknown, the closest match will be returned.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.FontSize
member.summary: The most common text size discovered within this page. Measured in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.Image
member.summary: A bitmap image of this page. The image may have been straightened if the original input image was skewed, deformed or had perspective.

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.Barcodes
member.summary: Objects describing each barcode found in this scanned page.

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.Paragraphs
member.summary: Objects describing each paragraph found in this scanned page.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.WordCount
member.summary: The number of words discovered by IronOcr in this page.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.Words
member.summary: Objects describing each word found in this scanned page.

member.name: M:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.Finalize
member.summary: OcrPage Destructor. Safely removed GDI+ references to page images to avoid memory leaks in System.Drawing.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.LinesOfText
member.summary: Objects describing each line of text found in this scanned page.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrPage.Characters
member.summary: Objects describing each character found in this scanned page.

member.name: T:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode
member.summary: Object describing a Barcode or QR code discovered by IronOcr. 20+ formats are supported.

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.Location
member.summary: The location and size of this barcode as discovered in

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.Width
member.summary: Width of the barcode in Pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.Height
member.summary: Height of the barcode in Pixels. Height may be approximated for 1 dimensional barcodes.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.X
member.summary: Horizontal location of this barcode relative to the left edge of the page. Measured in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.Y
member.summary: Vertical location of this barcode relative to the top edge of the page. Measured in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.Image
member.summary: An image of this barcode

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.PageNumber
member.summary: The OcrResult page number this barcode was found on

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.OcrObjectId
member.summary: A unique name for this barcode within an .

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.Format
member.summary: Describes the type of barcode discovered.

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.Value
member.summary: The value of this barcode as a string. It may represent numbers, a url, or UTF-8 text.

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.BarcodeNumber
member.summary: The position of this barcode within an . The first barcode is numbered 1, rather than zero.

member.name: M:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.ToString
member.summary: Returns the Value of this barcode as a string.

member.name: T:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrBarcode.BarcodeFormat
member.summary: Describes types of barcode

members.member: Aztec (2 Dimensional)
CODABAR (1 Dimensional)
Code 39 (1 Dimensional)
Code 93 (1 Dimensional)
Code 128 (1 Dimensional)
Data Matrix (2 Dimensional)
EAN-8 (1 Dimensional) EAN-13 (1 Dimensional)
ITF (Interleaved Two of Five) (1 Dimensional)
MaxiCode (2 Dimensional)
PDF417 format.
QR Code (2 Dimensional)
RSS 14
RSS Expanded
UPC-A (1 Dimensional)
UPC-E (1 Dimensional)
MSI
Plessey
Intelligent Mail Barcode

member.name: T:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph
member.summary: An object representing each paragraph of text read by IronOcr

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.Location
member.summary: The location and size of this paragraph as discovered in

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.Confidence
member.summary: The percentage statistical confidence IronOcr has in analysis of this paragraph of text. Values range from 0-100. For higher contrast (lower Confidence scores for words which may have been read incorrectly, try setting = and looking at the confidence of each individual Word.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.Width
member.summary: Width of the paragraph in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.Height
member.summary: Height of the paragraph in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.X
member.summary: Horizontal location of the paragraph relative to the left edge of the page. Measured in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.Y
member.summary: Vertical location of the paragraph relative to the top edge of the page. Measured in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.Image
member.summary: An image of this word

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.PageNumber
member.summary: The OcrResult page number this paragraph was found on

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.Text
member.summary: Full text discovered within this paragraph as a UFT-8 string. Each line of text - as read - will be separated by one Environment.NewLine

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.OcrObjectId
member.summary: A unique name for this paragraph of text within the OcrResults model.

member.name: M:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.ToString
member.summary: Return the paragraph's

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.WordCount
member.summary: Number of words in this paragraph

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.Words
member.summary: Objects describing each word in this paragraph.

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.Lines
member.summary: Objects describing each line of text in this paragraph.

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.ParagraphNumber
member.summary: The position of this word within its page

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.TextOrientation
member.summary: The clockwise rotation of this text relative to the top of the page. Measured in degrees. A value of 0 means the text is perfectly vertical.

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.TextDirection
member.summary: The direction in which text should be read within this paragraph.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.FontName
member.summary: The name of the most common font / typeface in this the paragraph. If the font is unknown, a close visual match will be chosen.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrParagraph.FontSize
member.summary: The most common font size for words within the paragraph. Measured in Pixels.

member.name: M:IronOcr.OcrResult.SaveAsTextFile(System.String)
member.summary: Saves the OCRText to a file.
member.param: The file path.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.FontName
member.summary: The name of the most common font / typeface the document. If the font is unknown, a close visual match will be chosen.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.FontSize
member.summary: The most common font size within the document. In Pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.Text
member.summary:
Gets the full text content for the document.
Each Lines as seen on the paper document with be terminated with System.NewLine. Paragraphs are separated by 2 x System.NewLine. Pages are separated by 4 x System.NewLine

member.name: M:IronOcr.OcrResult.ToString
member.summary: The full OCR text as a UTF-8 string.
member.returns: A that represents this instance.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.Barcodes
member.summary: All Barcodes and QR codes discovered within the document.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.Pages
member.summary: A detailed object model containing every paragraph, line of text, word and character in every page of the scanned document with detailed images, coordinates and meta-data.

member.name: T:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine
member.summary: An object representing each line of text discovered in an OCRResult

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.Location
member.summary: The location and size of this line of text as discovered in

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.Confidence
member.summary: The mean (average) percentage statistical confidence IronOcr has in its analysis of this line of text. Values range from 0-100.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.Width
member.summary: Width of the line of text, in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.Height
member.summary: Height of the line of text, in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.X
member.summary: Horizontal location of this line of text relative to the left edge of the page. Measured in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.Y
member.summary: Vertical location of this line of text relative to the top edge of the page. Measured in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.Image
member.summary: An image of this entire line of text

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.PageNumber
member.summary: The OcrResult page number this line of text was found on

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.OcrObjectId
member.summary: A unique name for this line of text within an .

member.name: M:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.ToString
member.summary: Return the line's full as a string

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.WordCount
member.summary: The number of words discovered within this line of text

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.Words
member.summary: Objects for word discovered within this line of text

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.BaselineOffset
member.summary: The displacement (signed distance) of the baseline of this text-line relative to its top edge (see ). For example the bottom baseline would sit at the bottom of a letter 'o', "a" or any number. The letters 'y' and 'g' have tails which drop below the baseline.

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.BaselineAngle
member.summary: The angle of skew (rotation) of the text, measured in counter-clockwise degrees.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.Text
member.summary: The full text of this line of words as a UTF-8 string. EAch word is separated by a single 'space' character.

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.ParagraphNumber
member.summary: The paragraph in which this line was found

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrLine.LineNumber
member.summary: The number of this line within its enclosing paragraph. One based.

member.name: T:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrCharacter
member.summary: An object representing each instance of each character (symbol) of readable text discovered with OCR.

member.summary: The location and size of this character as discovered in

member.summary: The percentage statistical confidence that this character has been correctly identified.

member.summary: Width of the character in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrCharacter.Height
member.summary: Height of the character in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrCharacter.X
member.summary: Horizontal location of the character relative to the left edge of the page. Measured in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrCharacter.Y
member.summary: Vertical location of the character relative to the top edge of the page. Measured in pixels.

member.name: P:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrCharacter.Image
member.summary: An image of this character

member.summary: Return the characters as a single length UFT-8 string.

member.summary: A unique name for this character instance within the OcrResults model.

member.summary: Return the characters as a single length UFT-8 string.

member.summary: The paragraph in which this character was found

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrWord.FontIsItalic
member.summary: Word is italic.

member.summary: Word has serif markings

member.summary: Word is underlined

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrWord.FontIsCaligraphic
member.summary: Word is written in ornate or luminary script

member.summary: The height of the typeface letters in this typeface. Measured in pixels.

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.OcrWord.TextDirection
member.summary: The direction in which this word should be read.

member.name: T:IronOcr.OcrResult.TextFlow
member.summary: The direction in which OCR text should be read. For Example English text is read "LeftToRight"

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.TextFlow.LeftToRight
member.summary: Text is read horizontally, left to right

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.TextFlow.RightToLeft
member.summary: Text is read horizontally, right to left

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.TextFlow.TopToBottom
member.summary: Text is read vertically, top to bottom (downwards in columns)

member.name: F:IronOcr.OcrResult.TextFlow.BottomToTop
member.summary: Text is read vertically, bottom to top (upwards in columns)

member.name: T:IronOcr.NamespaceDoc
member.summary:
IronOcr is an industry leading .Net OCR library. It provides cutting edge OCR technology in over 80 languages for C# and .Net framework software projects.
http://ironsoftware.com/csharp/ocr/

member.name: T:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr
member.summary: An advanced OCR engine which gives the developer access to advanced Image pro-processing and calibration settings. See also IronOcr.AutoOcr for a fully automated OCR Class with fewer settings.

member.name: T:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.OcrStrategy
member.summary: IronOcr image text analysis algorithms

members.member: Good speed to accuracy ratio
Higher accuracy with longer OCR processing times.

member.name: T:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.OcrColorSpace
member.summary: IronOcr can scan images in full color for greater accuracy, or in black, white and gray for speed.

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.OcrColorSpace.GrayScale
member.summary: Documents are converted to shades of Gray

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.OcrColorSpace.Color
member.summary: Documents are scanned by the OCR software in full color

member.name: T:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.InputTypes
member.summary: Types of document to expect to read.

members.member: IronOcr will inspect each image and make a conservative best guess.
IronOcr will expect the input to be a paper or digital document. This works well for a rendered images of digital files, paper & film scans, as well as photographs of paper document.
IronOcr will expect the input to be a single block of text cropped from an image, scan, document or a screen-shot

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.Language
member.summary: Natural Language of the scanned documents. Default is English.

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.DetectWhiteTextOnDarkBackgrounds
member.summary: Automatically detects and adjusts white text on darker backgrounds such as found in microfilm, negatives and some styles of graphic design.

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.RotateAndStraighten
member.summary:
AdvancedOcr will deskew and rotate images to be straight, upright, unbent and without perspective.
RotateAndStraighten is a powerful tool, making imperfect scans OCR accurately. CPU/GPU intensive.

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.CleanBackgroundNoise
member.summary:
AdvancedOcr will clean background 'noise' , dust, speckles and signs of paper away from printed text. Works even scrupled, stained or damaged paper.
RotateAndStraighten is a powerful tool, making imperfect scans OCR accurately. CPU/GPU intensive.

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.EnhanceContrast
member.summary: Enhances image contrast adaptively, which generally increases text readability both by humans ans machines.

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.EnhanceResolution
member.summary:
Re-renders low quality images at a higher DPI.
IronOcr works faster and more accurately with high resolution images. Useful for images scanned at under 250 DPI

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.ReadBarCodes
member.summary: Enables Barcodes to be extracted from OCR documents, alongside the text content.

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.ColorDepth
member.summary: Bits of color per channel per pixel. Lower ColorDepth can reduce scanning time for documents that also contain many colors or images. A value of ZERO will result in image color depths not being modified from the original source image.

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.ColorSpace
member.summary: OCR documents can be scanned in GreyScale to reduce processing time. This may not work well for low-contrast text on a non-white backgrounds.

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.Strategy
member.summary: Algorithm to be used for OCR text analysis.

member.name: F:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.InputImageType
member.summary: Hints the OCR Engine about the type of image being scanned, which can reduce OCR time and increase accuracy.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.Read(System.String)
member.summary: Performs OCR on an Image.
member.param: Document to be scanned as an image file path.
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.Read(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Performs OCR on multiple Images using multi-threaded parallel processing
member.param: Documents to be scanned as an image file path.
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.Read(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Performs OCR on an Image.
member.param: Document to be scanned as a System.Drawing.Image
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.Read(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Drawing.Image})
member.summary: Performs OCR on multiple Images simultaneously using parallel multi threading;
member.param: Document to be scanned as a System.Drawing.Image
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.Read(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.summary: Performs OCR on an Image.
member.param: Document to be scanned as a System.Drawing.Bitmap
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.Read(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Drawing.Bitmap})
member.summary: Performs OCR on multiple Images in parallel using multi-threading;
member.param: Documents to be scanned as an IEnumerable of System.Drawing.Bitmap
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

members.member:
Performs OCR on an PDF Document.
PDF Document to be converted back to text.
Optional enumerable list of pages. Only these page numbers will have OCR performed. Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

Performs OCR on an PDF Document.
The binary data for a PDF Document to be converted back to text.
Optional enumerable list of pages. Only these page numbers will have OCR performed. Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

Performs OCR on one page of a PDF Document.
PDF Document to be converted back to text.
Page number to OCR. The first page is 1 rather than 0. Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

Performs OCR on one page an PDF Document.
The binary data for a PDF Document to be converted back to text.
Page number to OCR. The first page is 1 rather than 0. Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

Performs OCR on one page an PDF Document.
The stream data for a PDF Document to be converted back to text.
Page number to OCR. The first page is 1 rather than 0. Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

Performs OCR on an PDF Document.
The stream data for a PDF Document to be converted back to text.
Optional enumerable list of pages. Only these page numbers will have OCR performed. Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence, etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.Read(System.String,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
Performs OCR on an Image.
Only Text and Barcodes within the CropArea will be scanned
member.param: Document to be scanned as an image file path.
A rectangular area of the image to be scanned for OCR.
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.Read(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
Performs OCR on an Image.
Only Text and Barcodes within the CropArea will be scanned
member.param: Document to be scanned as a System.Drawing.Image
A rectangular area of the image to be scanned for OCR.
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.Read(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary:
Performs OCR on an Image.
Only Text and Barcodes within the CropArea will be scanned
member.param: Document to be scanned as a System.Drawing.Bitmap
A rectangular area of the image to be scanned for OCR.
member.returns: Returns Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.ReadMultiThreaded(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs OCR on multiple images simultaneously, using multiple threads and cores for the best performance.
member.param: File paths to multiple images
The maximum number of document pages to be read simultaneously.
member.returns: Returns paginated results for all pages, containing Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

members.member:
Performs OCR on multiple images simultaneously, using multiple threads and cores for the best performance.
Multiple document pages to be scanned The maximum number of document pages to be read simultaneously. Returns paginated results for all pages, containing Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

Performs OCR on multiple images simultaneously, using multiple threads and cores for the best performance.
Multiple document pages to be scanned The maximum number of document pages to be read simultaneously. Returns paginated results for all pages, containing Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

member.name: M:IronOcr.AdvancedOcr.ReadMultiThreaded(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Int32)
member.summary: Performs OCR on multiple images simultaneously, using multiple threads and cores for the best performance.
member.param: File paths to multiple images
A rectangular area of the images to be scanned for OCR.
The maximum number of document pages to be read simultaneously.
member.returns: Returns paginated results for all pages, containing Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

members.member:
Performs OCR on multiple images simultaneously, using multiple threads and cores for the best performance.
Multiple document pages to be scanned A rectangular area of the images to be scanned for OCR. The maximum number of document pages to be read simultaneously. Returns paginated results for all pages, containing Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

Performs OCR on multiple images simultaneously, using multiple threads and cores for the best performance.
Multiple document pages to be scanned A rectangular area of the images to be scanned for OCR. The maximum number of document pages to be read simultaneously. Returns paginated results for all pages, containing Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

Performs OCR on a multi-pages image such as a multi-frame Tiff. Also works on GIF files.
File path to a Tiff file with multiple pages/frames>
Returns paginated OCR results for all pages of the Tiff, containing Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.

Performs OCR on a multi-pages image such as a multi-frame Tiff. Also works on GIF files.
Systemn.Drawing.Bitmap of a Tiff file with multiple pages/frames>
Returns paginated OCR results for all pages of the Tiff, containing Text, Barcodes, and an object model containing rich OCR data such as text-sizes, fonts, statistical confidence etc.
